title: Markup just released
content:
[Markup on MyFonts](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017192320/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/philatype/markup/)  
Suitable when a casual but edgy face is needed. Use it on notepads, labels for web graphics, for texture, or anything (within reason, of course).

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017192320im_/http:/typophile.com/files/markup_5539.gif)
author: kosal
